course_title: Qualitative Methods for Research and Evaluation
course_description: Focuses on the acquisition of interpretive, behavioral, and analytic strategies that social scientists use to understand social reality. Students are expected to undertake their own qualitative studies, as well as to learn the philosophical underpinnings of the method. Classic ethnographic studies, particularly those with applicability to public health, serve as models for learning techniques and conducting research.
prerequisites: This class is for students enrolled in the BSHES program only.
